attributes.action: Scrap the new 2012 Olympic Logo and replace it with a new one, or return it to the previous one.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On 4th June 2007 the new 2012 London Olympic Logo was unveiled. It cost £400000 but in many people's opinion is no better than the previous coloured rings logo. It looks messy, confused and does not portray anything synonymous with the Olympics - in fact the lettering "London" and Olympic rings are tiny. It is not instantly recognisable as an olympic logo. The new logo is seen by some as a waste of money and not representing our country in any way. If you agree please sign this petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
